alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson; Lee; Owsley; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 10:09PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Owsley, southwestern Estill, Jackson, Rockcastle and southwestern Lee Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1008 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Boone to Hiatt to Burr. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sinks, Withers and Donaro around 1015 PM EDT. Jep Hill, Bummer, Johnetta, Robinet, Horse Lick, Gauley, Cooksburg, Climax, Shirley and Disputanta around 1020 PM EDT. Dango, Ardery, Goochland, Carico, Threelinks, Loam, Hisel, Clover Bottom and Kerby Knob around 1025 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Locust Branch, Middlefork, Jinks, Eglon, Collingsworth, Shop Branch, Alcorn, Parrot, Sandgap, Brazil, Dabolt, Waneta, Blanton Flats, Hurley, Deese, Station Camp, Bond, Cornelius, McKee, Alumbaugh, Drip Rock, Macedonia, Atkinstown, Gray Hawk, Mildred, Wagersville, Olin, Bradshaw, Turkey Foot, Leighton, Evelyn, Herd, Mummie, New Zion, Zekes Point, Privett, Shade and Maulden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
